original_query: I would like to understand how to integrate AI agents with our FreshService for our IT Team to help them with tickets.

query_analysis.main_topic: Integration of AI agents with FreshService for IT ticket management
implicit_needs: Examples or case studies of similar integrations
ambiguities: Level of detail needed (overview vs. technical guide)
Specific goals (automation, improved response time, analytics)

clarifying_questions.question: Are you interested in specific types of AI agents, such as chatbots, predictive analytics, or automation workflows?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To determine which AI functionalities to focus on for integration

clarifying_questions.question: Would you like to see case studies or examples of similar organizations successfully integrating AI with FreshService?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To assess the level of contextual detail and practical insights needed

clarifying_questions.question: What is your preferred level of technical detail—high-level overview, step-by-step implementation, or technical documentation?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To tailor the depth of information provided

clarifying_questions.question: Are there specific constraints or requirements, such as preferred AI platforms, budget limitations, or existing systems to integrate with?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To identify any constraints or specific needs that could influence the solution

clarifying_questions.question: What are the primary goals you want to achieve with AI integration—improved ticket response time, reduced workload, better analytics, or others?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To understand the main objectives to focus the research

suggested_refinement: Specify the key functionalities or outcomes you aim to achieve with AI integration in FreshService to receive more targeted guidance.
